title: One Piece Episode 335 Recap
author: The Adult Swim Squad
description: A detailed recap and review of Episode 335, praising it as a great way to close out the Ice Hunter Arc. The reviewer gave it a 4.5/5 rating, noting that the final fight was excellent and appreciating that One Piece filler arcs are consistently entertaining.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Full spoilers for Episode 335 and the Ice Hunter Arc conclusion

title: One Piece | Ice Hunter Arc | Summary, Recap, & Review
author: Poggers
description: A comprehensive review of the Ice Hunter Arc giving it a low 2/10 rating for characterization and development. The review criticizes the arc for being too long (10 episodes) with disappointing character arcs and flat action sequences.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Complete spoilers for the entire Ice Hunter Arc (Episodes 326-335)

title: One Piece Filler Arcs, Part 3 -- Ice Hunter, Spa Island & Movie Tie-Ins
author: Blackjack Rants
description: A detailed analysis of One Piece filler arcs including the Ice Hunter Arc. Provides episode-by-episode breakdown and critical commentary on the arc's strengths and weaknesses.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Full spoilers for Ice Hunter Arc and surrounding filler content

title: One Piece Diaries #42: Ice Hunter Arc
author: COMICON
description: Part of the One Piece Diaries series, this article provides a first-time watcher's perspective on the Ice Hunter Arc, including Episode 335's conclusion.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Spoilers for the entire Ice Hunter Arc

title: One Piece: All The Filler Arcs, Ranked According To IMDb
author: GameRant
description: A ranking of all One Piece filler arcs based on IMDb ratings. Notes that the Ice Hunter Arc would fare better if it was half as long, criticizing it as a slog to get through.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Discusses multiple filler arcs throughout the series

title: One Piece: 6 Non-Canon Devil Fruits That Got A Canonical Counterpart
author: GameRant
description: An article examining anime-only Devil Fruits that later received similar canonical versions in the manga. Discusses the Atsu Atsu no Mi (Don Accino's fruit) and its similarity to Charlotte Oven's Netsu Netsu no Mi.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Spoilers for both filler content and Whole Cake Island arc

title: Episode 335 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: The comprehensive wiki page for Episode 335, containing detailed episode information, plot summary, character appearances, and production credits.

title: Ice Hunter Arc - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: The comprehensive wiki page for the Ice Hunter Arc, detailing all episodes, characters, locations, and events from episodes 326-335.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Complete spoilers for the entire Ice Hunter Arc
